title: Nonlinear Control
description: Advanced treatment of nonlinear robust control. Lyapunov stability theory, absolute stability, dissipativity, feedback linearization, Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman theory, nonlinear H-infinity, backstepping control, and control Lyapunov functions.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:

prerequisites: ECE 6550 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
